lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization (WHO) on Saturday rejected a call for the Rio Olympic Games to be moved or postponed due to the threat posed by a large outbreak of Zika virus in Brazil.

headline.print_headline: WHO Rejects Call for Olympics to Be Moved Due to Zika
headline.main: WHO Rejects Call for Olympics to Be Moved Due to Zika
